name: puppeteer_screenshots_pdf
description: Capture screenshots and generate PDFs of web pages

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); const fs = require('fs'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.screenshot({path: '/tmp/puppeteer_screenshot.png'}); const stats = fs.statSync('/tmp/puppeteer_screenshot.png'); console.log('Screenshot saved:', stats.size, 'bytes'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Screenshot saved: 28431 bytes

Full page screenshot captured

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.screenshot({path: '/tmp/fullpage.png', fullPage: true}); console.log('Full page screenshot saved'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Full page screenshot saved

Entire scrollable page captured

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); const fs = require('fs'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.pdf({path: '/tmp/page.pdf', format: 'A4'}); const stats = fs.statSync('/tmp/page.pdf'); console.log('PDF generated:', stats.size, 'bytes'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
PDF generated: 14287 bytes

Page rendered as PDF document
